CaptureSummary: Please capture a bahtinov image to start any adjustments.
CaptureBullet1: Start capture and ensure the star is centered and not saturated.
CaptureBullet2: Then press “What should I do next?” again.
FocusOnlyMoveInBullet1: Move the focuser IN slightly and re-check.
FocusOnlyMoveInBullet2: If needed, continue with small steps.
FocusOnlyMoveOutBullet1: Move the focuser OUT slightly and re-check.
FocusOnlyMoveOutBullet2: If needed, continue with small steps.
FocusBalancedSummary: Before adjusting collimation screws, focus so the three values are centered around 0 and similar in magnitude.
FocusAllPositiveBullet: All values are positive. Move the focuser IN in small steps.
FocusAllNegativeBullet: All values are negative. Move the focuser OUT in small steps.
FocusStraddleNotBalancedBullet1: Values straddle 0, but they are not balanced yet.
FocusStraddleNotBalancedBullet2Format: Move the focuser {0} using small focus moves to bring the three values toward 0 evenly.
FocusTargetLineFormat: Target: average near 0 and similar magnitudes (mean={0}, max|v|={1}).
FocusOnlyBeginScrewsBullet: Only begin screw adjustments once the three values are balanced around 0.
FocusFooterHint: Tip: Re-center the star after each focus change. Drift can mimic imbalance.
CollimationSummary: Values straddle 0. Proceed with balanced collimation using 2 or more screws at the same time.
DoneSummary: All values are close to zero.
CollimationIntroBullet: Values straddle zero. Proceed with balanced collimation.
CollimationPositiveInstructionFormat: {0} is positive ({1}). The area under {2} is too far from the primary. loosen {2} very slightly.
CollimationNegativeInstructionFormat: {0} is negative ({1}). The area under {2} is too close to the primary. Tighten {2} very slightly.
CollimationAdjustTogetherBullet: Adjust these screws together to keep tension balanced.
CollimationRepeatCycleBullet: Re-center the star, re-measure, then refocus until the values straddle 0 again before repeating.
